medium: Reed, silver, wood, cloth, opium, silk
title: Smoking Set
description: Set consisting of pipe, pipe-case, tobacco-pouch and attached carved ivory netsuke.  Pipe, polished reed with silver ends, decorated with various sea animals in relief.  L.7-3/4 in.; Pouch opium-pouch of wood, carved to resemble leather and decorated with a landscape.  Lined with cloth; contains some opium; tan silk cord. L.3-1/2 x W.2-5/8 x D.1-3/4 in.; Pipe case woven reed, like cane or bamboo, decorated with quill pen and flower in black and gold. L8-1/4 x W.1-1/8 x D.5/8 in.; Netsuke carved ivory monkey; long roll in one paw, other held up.
